resources.string:
The solution is based on the document standard HTML5 and the report template has to be self-contained.
This means that no external links are allowed in the document. All resources used by the document like pictures and film clips has to be encoded as Base64 strings.

Template reports can be stored as regular self-contained HTML5 files.

The concept allows the user to create custom SQL-queries that can be associated with the report template it self in a very simple way.

Please note that this is a demo app and dummy data is used

For more info check out the below links
Developer : http://tinyurl.com/nvhkrq9 
Github : 

Feel free to roam around the code and feedback's are always welcome!
